description.en: Artificial intelligence, neuroscience and psychology. The interaction of these fields.
description.et: Tehisintellekt, ajuteadus ja psühholoogia. Nende alade omavaheline interaktsioon.

objectives.en: The overall goal of the course is to provide a unified theoretical basis for understanding and developing artificial intelligence. Specific goals: to gain a deeper understanding of what we mean by "intelligence"; understand the differences between natural and artificial intelligence; to be up-to-date with modern approaches to creating artificial intelligence.
objectives.et: Kursuse üldeesmärk on anda üldine teoreetiline põhi tehisintellekti mõistmiseks ja arendamiseks. Kitsamad eesmärgid: Mõista sügavamalt seda, mis üldse on intellekt. Aru saada, mille poolest erinevad loomulik ja tehislik mõistus. Olla kursis tänapäevaste ponnistustega luua inimmõistusele sarnane tehisintellekt.

learning_outcomes.en: By the end of the course the student will know
- the history of studying artificial intelligence
- the differences between artificial and natural intelligence
- the cutting edge science on artificial intelligence.
In general the student will be able to evaluate and criticize scientific literature on the brain as well as to understand the main differences between human and machine intelligence.
learning_outcomes.et: Tudeng oskab läbi viia teadusprojekti ja disainida baaseksperimente, mis aitavad mõista inimaju. Üldiste õpitavate oskuste alla kuulub teaduskirjanduse hindamine ja kritiseerimine ning põhiliste inim- ja tehisintelligentsuse erinevuste mõistmine.
